summary: Red and Blue journey around the world to find The Great Sword of Destiny. Blue discovers that Red was never his friend at all, now they are enemies and are in worst situations imaginable.
cast: Ed Skudder|Zack Keller|Eric Bauza|Ben Tuller|Shea Logsdon|Lauren K. Sokolov|Chad Quandt|Michael Nassar|Nick Ainsworth|Nick Keller|John Dusenberry|Brock Gallagher|Ashley Shelhon|Rob DenBleyker|Dave McElfatrick|David Haley|Brendan Haines|Thomas Ridgewell
title: Dick Figures: The Movie
